title.en: God Provides a Way of Protection

en: God tells Moses that one final plague is coming—and that Pharaoh will finally release the Israelites.
Moses gives the people instructions for a night they will never forget.

lines: Now the Lord had said to Moses,
“I will bring one more plague on Pharaoh and on Egypt.
After that, he will let you go from here,
he will drive you out completely.”
Then Moses summoned all the elders of Israel and said to them,
“Go at once and select the animals for your families
dip it into the blood in the basin
and put some of the blood
on the top and on both sides of the doorframe.
Not one of you shall go out the door of his house until morning.”
“When the Lord goes through the land to strike down the Egyptians,
he will see the blood on the top and sides of the doorframe
and will pass over that doorway,
and he will not permit the destroyer
to enter your houses and strike you down.”

question.en: What do you notice about warning, obedience, and protection in these instructions?
